docs.snippet: Justice Ginsburg took stock of a tumultuous term for the Supreme Court after the death of Justice Antonin Scalia and gave her thoughts about a Trump presidency....
docs.lead_paragraph: Justice Ginsburg took stock of a tumultuous term for the Supreme Court after the death of Justice Antonin Scalia and gave her thoughts about a Trump presidency.
docs.abstract: Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg is outspoken in her distaste for presumptive Republican presidential nominee Donald J Trump; assesses Court's recent decisions and expresses frustration at stalled nomination of Judge Merrick B Garland, whom she wholeheartedly endorses.

headline.main: Ruth Bader Ginsburg, No Fan of Donald Trump, Critiques Latest Term
headline.print_headline: Ginsburg Has a Few Words About Trump

docs.abstract: Governing coalition of Prime Min Shinzo Abe gains two-thirds of seats in Japan's upper house of Parliament, move which enables them to revise 69-year-old Constitution that denounces war.
